title: "What is Futurizing and How Can You Handle it? Tips for Identifying and Working with Your Inner Child's Brand of Futurizing"
first_phrase: In this text, the author explores the concept of "Futurizing," the emotional state that adults experience when their inner child duplicates their family's reaction to betrayal. The author provides a three-step process for handling Futurizing, including identifying the type of Futurizing, noticing where the inner child resides in one's body, and engaging in inner dialogue. The last 200 tokens of the text focus on handling the type of Futurizing known as Catastrophizing, including specific questions to ask the inner child and intentional resistance or experience. The author emphasizes the importance of acknowledging and addressing the inner child's emotions to promote healing and growth.
